amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the second paragraph of title IV. In its entirety, title IV provides funds for Overseas Contingency Operations for the Department of Defense.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the pending paragraph pertaining to the Military Construction, Air Force.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 229, 1 Present (Roll no. 185).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 229, 1 Present (Roll no. 185).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
